column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Varrick says : " I ca n't believe Kuvira locked me in here like a prisoner !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Great !
#Text=Now we 're both gon na die !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Varrick ?
#Text=Varrick ?!
#Text=" Varrick says : " Ahh !
#Text=And the head voices are back !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Bolin !
#Text=Thank goodness you 're here !
#Text=Where did that hatch come from ?
#Text=Forget the hatch !
#Text=There 's something important I got ta tell ya !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , there 's something important I got ta tell you , too !
#Text=" Varrick and Bolin says : " Kuvira 's crazy !
#Text=" Bolin says : " How 'd you find out ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " When I refused to build her a superweapon , she threatened my life !
#Text=" Bolin says : " She threatened me , too !
#Text=And she 's threatening Zaofu and it turns out , she 's been threatening villages this whole time !
#Text=We got ta get outta here .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I could n't agree more , kid .
#Text=" Baatar Jr. says : " We have an unexpected guest .
#Text=The Avatar is here to see you .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Korra , it 's such an honor to see you again .
#Text=The last I heard , you were still healing in the South Pole .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I 'm feeling much better now .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " That 's wonderful news .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm here to ask you to back down .
#Text=Please .
#Text=Take your army and leave .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I think we both know that 's not going to happen .
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't let you take Zaofu .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Look , I was tasked with bringing stability to the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=Zaofu is the last holdout .
#Text=Why should I treat it differently than any other state ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What you 're doing is n't right !
#Text=" Kuvira says : " I understand you 're just trying to do Su a favor , but you ca n't come to me as I am on the verge of reuniting my nation and tell me to stop .
#Text=The world was descending into chaos while you were gone .
#Text=In order to fix it , I had to make some tough decisions .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know what that 's like .
#Text=I 've had plenty of people mad at me about decisions I 've made .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Exactly .
#Text=Korra , if you really want to help , go back to Su and try to talk some sense into her .
#Text=Let 's call a temporary truce .
#Text=I wo n't make any moves until you talk to her and get back to me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe that will be for the best .
#Text="
